name: dA Eclipse - New notification center fix
description:
New notification center adjustments
- Bell on the right
- Gallery preview removed for activity stats
css:
@-moz-document url("https://www.deviantart.com/notifications") {
/*Ausblenden Activity Stuff*/
div[data-nc]:not([data-nc*="radom_recommendation"]) ._15VsP .meqww._32_r3,
div[data-nc]:not([data-nc*="radom_recommendation"]) .QVkuJ ._3U9kU.PvCS2,
div[data-nc]:not([data-nc*="radom_recommendation"]) .jWr99 ._157jM._3YGe-,
div[data-nc]:not([data-nc*="radom_recommendation"]) .rdUjK ._5wfpP._3p66b,
div[data-nc]:not([data-nc*="radom_recommendation"]) ._2GMgB ._1qu75._1ySB0,
div[data-nc]:not([data-nc*="radom_recommendation"]) ._2_0Dn ._3uhQ2._3pY60,
.GNyAz > span,
.XJAZb > span,
.qtF97 > span,
._26oMz > span,
._1iyCz._2CTEl._1_DHt._2Dqb3._1smTa._3_AyV._2dSh1,
.mcWlc._3j1gg.HsNJH._3l8eJ._3ifTu._3Wwoa._1PcaN,
._29oAF._3kbfO._2B20E.RapS-._2G7ck._3VfsK.ZqttP,
._3Vvhk._2vgDq._3qx5z._2aK3Y.I_OfQ.ArLmM._2nyzj,
._1wThi._3ibi2._1hCBB._1wcfG._1BEuw.plU7i._1TSmg
  {
    display: none;
  }

/*Einblenden von allem in Reply/Comment*/
.QVkuJ ._3U9kU.PvCS2._32Y9s,
.jWr99 ._157jM._3YGe-._1UFFX,
._15VsP .meqww._32_r3._1r4EY,
.rdUjK ._5wfpP._3p66b._39IyJ,
._2GMgB ._1qu75._1ySB0._3ovJb,
._2_0Dn ._3uhQ2._3pY60.odzcU,
._3U9kU._2_crF.PvCS2,
._5wfpP.gwrZi._3p66b,
._157jM._30I5m._3YGe-,
.meqww.KldP-._32_r3,
.zMp8a._1BkQB._1WYnD,
.XdoaB[data-nc*="radom_recommendation"] .jWr99 ._157jM._3YGe
  {
     display: flex !important;
  }

/*Abstand unten innerhalbe Activity*/
.QVkuJ,
.jWr99,
._15VsP,
.rdUjK,
._2GMgB,
._2_0Dn
  {
    margin-bottom: 0;
  }

/*Reply Button ABstand nach unten*/
._3U9kU.PvCS2._32Y9s,
._157jM._3YGe-._1UFFX,
.meqww._32_r3._1r4EY,
._5wfpP._3p66b._39IyJ,
._1qu75._1ySB0._3ovJb,
._3uhQ2._3pY60.odzcU{
    margin-bottom: 5px
}

/*Abst√§nde zwischen Activities*/
.w_IGg[data-nc*="favecollect-nc.fave"],
.w_IGg[data-nc*=".like-nc.comment_liked"],
.w_IGg[data-nc*="watch-nc.new_watcher"],
.w_IGg[data-nc*="badge-nc.badge_given"],
.XdoaB[data-nc*="favecollect-nc.fave"],
.XdoaB[data-nc*=".like-nc.comment_liked"],
.XdoaB[data-nc*="watch-nc.new_watcher"],
.XdoaB[data-nc*="badge-nc.badge_given"],
._2kbfB[data-nc*="favecollect-nc.fave"],
._2kbfB[data-nc*=".like-nc.comment_liked"],
._2kbfB[data-nc*="watch-nc.new_watcher"],
._2kbfB[data-nc*="badge-nc.badge_given"],
.l1Cdj[data-nc*="favecollect-nc.fave"],
.l1Cdj[data-nc*=".like-nc.comment_liked"],
.l1Cdj[data-nc*="watch-nc.new_watcher"],
.l1Cdj[data-nc*="badge-nc.badge_given"],
._1_BSF[data-nc*="favecollect-nc.fave"],
._1_BSF[data-nc*=".like-nc.comment_liked"],
._1_BSF[data-nc*="watch-nc.new_watcher"],
._1_BSF[data-nc*="badge-nc.badge_given"],
._2RXFn[data-nc*="favecollect-nc.fave"],
._2RXFn[data-nc*=".like-nc.comment_liked"],
._2RXFn[data-nc*="watch-nc.new_watcher"],
._2RXFn[data-nc*="badge-nc.badge_given"],
div[data-nc*="favecollect-nc.collect"]
  {
    margin-bottom: -7px;
  }


/*Delte and Save button visbility*/
.B-ZO-._1n8vm._1Ezd-,
._1oJDx._1flXW._3UUs7,
._1LNZO.XxSli.q_DeT,
._2kMWf._3GrKo._3DG5i,
._8aYGI._1AWoY._3XP30,
._2g-Fx._1LJa3._3nbBu
  {
    visibility: visible;
  }


}
